name: CVE-2022-42799
description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 16.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, Safari 16.1, iOS 16.1 and iPadOS 16. Visiting a malicious website may lead to user interface spoofing.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:macos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:watchos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:tvos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:ipados:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:iphone_os:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:apple:safari:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:37:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
